archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Initiate Additional Product Offering Purchase(s)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Brief Description Prepare product offering purchases in the form of product offering orders for each product offering fulfilled by another party. Extended Description Initiate Additional Product Offering Purchase(s) prepares product offering purchase(s) in the form of product offering orders for each product offering fulfilled by one or more other parties. The order(s) is/are provided to the Initiate Product Offering Purchase process.
